sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import { Form, CloseButton, Modal, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import ModalAdd from "./ModalAdd"; function ModalEdit( isOpenEdit, hideModalEdit, id, updateStatus, setUpdateStatus, updateSkill, setUpdateSkill, updateLevel, setUpdateLevel, updateQuestion, setUpdateQuestion, updateAnswer, setUpdateAnswer, onSubmitEdit ){ return ( <> Edit Question
ID: Status: setUpdateStatus(e.target.value)} > Skill: setUpdateSkill(e.target.value)} > Level: setUpdateLevel(e.target.value)} > Question: setUpdateQuestion(e.target.value)} /> Answer: setUpdateAnswer(e.target.value)} />
); } export default ModalEdit
